mighty and strong one. This is the nation of Assyria, which besieged Samaria in 724 b.c. under Shalmaneser, and three years later took her people away into captivity under Sargon II (10:3-11; 2 Kgs. 17:3-6). Interestingly, the Lord said he would raise up "one mighty and strong" in the last days (D&C 85:7).

which as a tempest of hail. Assyria demolished the Northern Kingdom as easily as a tempest of hail or a destroying storm destroys a flower, or as a flood of mighty waters overcomes the banks of a river.
